messages.subject: parenting magazines/books
messages.msgSnippet: My son loves to cut those magazines up to glue in his books he makes for us and his baby sister.  There are so many photos of babies, parents, toys,
messages.messageBody:
My son loves to cut those magazines up to glue in his "books" he makes for us
and his baby sister. There are so many photos of babies, parents, toys,
strollers, etc. When I taught preschool, my kids loved them there as well. But
the ARTICLES in the big commercial ones are pretty much the same things every
month. I like my Welcome Home publication much better.
As for books by the "experts", some parts of some books I've found
helpful...that's why of course we love the library! And I have been reading every
hs/unschooling book I can get my hands on lately. Our library just got a Home Ed
Mag subscription, yippie! This is one I might have to get myself.
Amanda


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
